title: High School Graduate of the Old Basic Curriculum (2015 and below)
requirments: ⦿ Birth Certificate issued by the Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA) formerly NSO
⦿ 2 pcs. passport size, white background, with name tag (ex. DELA CRUZ, Juan)

title: Senior High School Graduate (2016 and above):
requirments: ⦿ Birth Certificate issued by the Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA) formerly NSO
⦿ 2 pcs. passport size, white background, with name tag (ex. DELA CRUZ, Juan)

title: ALS/A&E Passers (Secondary Level):
requirments: ⦿ Certificate indicating that the student is eligible for admission to college.
⦿ Birth Certificate issued by the Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA) formerly NSO
⦿ 2 pcs. passport size, white background, with name tag (ex. DELA CRUZ, Juan)

title: Transferees (In-bound):
requirments: ⦿ Birth Certificate issued by the Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA) formerly NSO
⦿ 2 pcs. passport size, white background, with name tag (ex. DELA CRUZ, Juan)

title: Returning Students:
requirments: ⦿ Certificate of Final Grades or class cards from previous semester

title: Graduate School:
requirments: ⦿ Birth Certificate or if married woman Marriage Contract issued by the Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA) formerly NSO
⦿ 2 pcs. passport size, white background, with name tag (ex. DELA CRUZ, Juan)
